scheme_name: Educational Assistance to the Children Studying in 1st to 7th and 8th to 10th Class
description: This scheme in Maharashtra provides financial assistance to children studying in classes 1st to 7th and 8th to 10th to support their education. The scheme targets economically disadvantaged students to reduce dropout rates and promote primary and secondary education.
key_features: Financial support for students in classes 1st to 10th
Supports school fees and educational materials

benefits.assistance_amount: Varies based on class and state guidelines
benefits.coverage: School fees, books, uniforms, and other expenses

education_criteria: Students enrolled in classes 1st to 7th or 8th to 10th
Must be studying in recognized schools in Maharashtra
additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Maharashtra
Annual family income must not exceed state-specified limit (typically Rs. 2.5 Lakhs)
institution_criteria: Government or recognized private schools in Maharashtra

steps: Visit the Maharashtra scholarship portal or school office
Verification by school or state authorities
application_process.note: Check with school or portal for application deadlines

required_documents.note: To prove family income below state-specified limit

special_notes: Assistance amount varies based on class level
Renewal requires proof of continued enrollment
Limited to students in recognized Maharashtra schools
